Name: HIKIBYOU2
About the game: HIKIBYOU2 is an action/adventure platfomer with puzzle and stealth elements. A bit of what differentiates itself from the first title in the series, Hikikomori No Chuunibyou, is this successor's less realistic approach and more atmospheric vibe. Levels are once again open-ended with the story directing the player. Features: Open-ended levels with story-focused progression Various platforming challenges and puzzles Unlimited continues and frequent checkpoints Pixel-art graphics and electronic soundtrack Supports Xbox 360 Controller (recommended)
